description: Definition of a variable
collection that this variable is part of
dataset that this variable is part of
name of the variable, unique within a dataset
human readable name, if applicable
description of the variable
in case of protocolised data collection this defines the moment(s) in time this variable is collected on
data type, e.g. string, integer, decimal, date, datetime, etc.
in case of a continuous variable, the unit that the variable values are expressed in
when this variable was introduced
when this variable was removed if applicable
the repeat unit, in case the variable was repeatedly collected over time, e.g. month or week
the first repeat unit
the last repeat unit
whether this variable is required within this collection
to sort variables you can add an order value
example values for this variable
listing of variable values, filled out in Variable values table
keywords that will make the variable easier to find
vocabularies used to express the values of this variable
any other information on this variable
listing of harmonised variables this variable was mapped to, filled out in Variable mappings table
